meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> crashes into the <radical>sun</radical>, which is then caught in a <radical>net</radical> and tied to a <radical>stool</radical>! Wait a second... this doesn't sound realistic, it sounds really <kanji>comic</kanji>! That's because it's from that comic book about a pirate you're always reading!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Comic</kanji>s are <reading>man</reading>ga (まん) in Japan, whether they're comic or serious.
